meanings.definition: A sweet white wine from the Sauternes region of France.
meanings.sent1: During the celebration, they served a delicious sauternes with dessert.
meanings.sent2: The sauternes paired perfectly with the rich foie gras.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over a bottle of sauternes, creating a sticky mess.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet as a glass of sauternes on a summer evening.
meanings.sent5: The golden hue of the sauternes shimmered in the candlelight, enticing all guests.

meanings.definition: To cook food quickly in a small amount of fat over high heat.
meanings.sent1: She decided to sauternes the vegetables for a healthy stir-fry.
meanings.sent2: The chef expertly sauternes the shrimp in the sizzling pan.
meanings.sent3: As the butter sizzled, she knew it was time to sauternes the chicken.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of garlic filled the kitchen as she began to sauternes the onions.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the food being sauternessed in the pan was music to her ears.
